item.title: Build pipelines with Jenkins 2 by example
item.description: Introduction Jenkins World 2017 came to a close in late September. Time to revisit the improvements that have been made to the support for build pipelines. I am no stranger to using Jenkins to model a Continuous Delivery pipeline. In the dark ages, you had to construct a pipeline with the help of different Jenkins plugins bit by bit. The approach was highly brittle, inconsistent and full of magical tips and tricks.
